title: How to balance Nidalee

embed.description: Patch 5.7 will hit live in the early hours of April 8th (assuming there are no delays). Here are its contents: New Store Content Visual Updates Balance Changes Here are links to all the content that's been on the PBE for testing but will NOT be coming with Patch 5.7: Omega Squad Teemo is here!

body:
So, i saw the upcoming nerf to nidalee's base health and asked myself as an experienced Nidalee player (who also thinks that Nidalee is a bit too strong) why they nerf her health instead of working on her abilities. I thought a lot about this and came to the end that i would make a lot of changes. So, here they are:
Q: Javelin Toss: I would increase the AP-ratio from 40% to 50%
Q: Takedown: I would deacrease the AP-ratio from 36% to 20% and increase the AD-ratio from 75% to 90%, because i think that Nidalee shouldnt be able to oneshot people with a combo in her cougar form without the Passive (she can do this sometimes if she is a little ahead and has Lichbane)
W: Pounce: I would change the cooldown from 5 sec to 7/6/6.5/5 seconds (the cooldown goes down by leveling up R)
E: Primal Surge: I would increase the base heal from 45/85/125/165/205 health to 75/125/175/225/275 and lower the AP-ratio from 50% to 35%.

This would be the changes i would make to balance her, she would be able to be played in both styles AD-Bruiser and AP-Mage like it was said in the champion spotlight, which is old but it still counts, right?
I like to see what you guys think so please tell me your ideas to balance Nidalee.
